Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
Attacks ignore up to {PiercingCoverIgnore} of the enemy's cover and bypass {PiercingArmorBypass}.
Attacks have Impact and deal {OverwhelmingAlphaDamage} increased damage against undamaged targets.
Attacks with this weapon deal {TargetDamageIncrease} additional damage in Overwatch, and the unit's Overwatch attacks cover 360 degrees.
Fire at a target. Shots travel through the Void, shifting and changing direction, causing all attacks from this weapon to flank the target.

Fire at a target. When this weapon critically hits, it causes [abilityred]Madness[/abilityred] in non-Mindless and non-Mad targets for {durationMind}[turn/] turns.[br/]Madness applies [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred], [abilityred]Insanity[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred] at random.
Unleash a psionic screech at a target.
Fire an RPG that deals damage in a 1 hex radius.
Throw a static bomb that deals damage in a 1 hex radius.
Concentrate on a target, attempting to induce [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred].
Throw a bomb that deals damage in a 1 hex radius.
Concentrate on a target, attempting to apply [abilityred]Filled with Despair[/abilityred].
Throw a single target bomb that is filled with a hardening cocktail.
Throw a canister that deals damage in a 1 hex radius and creates a cloud of choking smoke.
Throw a canister that creates a blurring cloud that makes units inside harder to hit. The cloud lasts for {BlurringCanDuration}[turn/]
Resupply target friendly unit, resetting its once per battle abilities and cooldowns.
Revive target Biological or Cyborg unit with {AEDAssistantHeal}% of the unit's maximum [hp/]. Only works on land.
Ranged weapons gain one level of Impact.
Grants the hero the ability to reposition themselves.
Exoskeleton systems grant the hero fast movement and one level of stagger resistance.

Deploy a flying attack drone armed with laser weapons. The drone expires after {DroneLaserDuration}[turn/].[br/][br/]The summoned unit will inherit any compatible mods that do not grant an active ability.[br/]
Fire at a target. If the targeted unit is of tier I or II, there is a {instakillchance} strength chance it will instantly die.
Swing this ethereal weapon at an enemy.
Heals the attacking unit when it deals damage.
Fire at a target. After hitting an enemy, the flaming shot passes through the target and hits any unit in a {linedist} hex line.
Melee attack with a melting blade that strikes all targets in front of this unit.
Incinerate anything that crosses your path.
Swing at a target, causing the arc within this blade to bounce up to {targetnum} targets within {hexrange} hexes for half damage.
Fire at a target. The jolt of electricity emanating from this weapon jumps to {CrystalJump} other targets within {CrystalRange} hexes.
Shoot a ball of energy that deals damage in a 1 hex radius. Attempts to [abilityred]Stun[/abilityred] the center target.
Fire at a target. At the end of a combat turn, if this weapon was fired, it becomes stronger.[br/]Power is an addiction.
Fire at a target. Avarice will become the preferred overwatch ability when equipped.
Throw an advanced mining grenade that deals damage in a 1 hex radius.
Fire at a location, dealing damage in a 1 hex radius.
Fire at a location, dealing damage in a 1 hex radius.
Damage all foes in a {HexRadius} hex radius with a powerful psionic burst.
Heal all friendly units in a {Hexradius} hex range for {GraceHeal}[hp/] and remove all negative Status Effects.

Dark energy springs forth from this psi-stone, allowing you to try to control an enemy unit. Attempts to apply Mind Control (Strength {MindControlChance}[StrengthPsyche/]) for as long as the hero lives. On resist, apply Broken Mind.
Heal target Cyborg or Mechanical unit for {TacticalRepairHealth}[hp/] for each [movewalk/] action point used during the heal.
Heal target Biological or Cyborg unit for {TacticalAidHealth}[hp/] for each action point used during the heal.
Increase target unit's damage by {ProvisionalDamage}% for 2[turn/].
Revive target Cyborg or Mechanical unit with {MechanicalAssistantHeal}% of the unit's maximum [hp/].
Increase target unit's damage by {ProvisionalMKIIDamage}% and accuracy by {ProvisionalMKIIAcc}% for 2[turn/].
Target unit's damage is increased by {ProWeaponAugDam}% and its accuracy is increased by {ProWeaponAugAcc}%.
Heal target unit for {WideRangeMKIIHeal}[hp/] Hit Points, or revive a dead unit with {WideRangeMKIIReviveHeal}% of its max[hp/] Hit Points.

Deploy a flying repair drone that can heal units. The drone expires after {DroneRepairDuration}[turn/].[br/][br/]The summoned unit will inherit any compatible mods that do not grant an active ability.[br/]
Deploy a flying melee skirmishing drone. The drone expires after {DroneSkirmishDuration}[turn/].[br/][br/]The summoned unit will inherit any compatible mods that do not grant an active ability.[br/]

The unit gains [abilityblue]Mind's Eye[/abilityblue], becoming unable to be Flanked, has it's sensor range increased by {IncreasedSensor} and gains immunity to [abilityblue]Psionic Status Effects and Hazards[/abilityblue].
This unit is unable to be Flanked, has it's sensor range increased by {IncreasedSensor} and has immunity to [abilityblue]Psionic Status Effects and Hazards[/abilityblue].
A system that creates an image of the unit, making it seem as if it is a small distance from where it actually is. The unit is {CloackingSysEvade}% harder to hit.
A powerful device that projects a cloaking field over the hero's army. All units in the hero's army gain Universal Camouflage as long as the hero is leading the army.
Heal for {FeastAmount} when damaging Biological or Cyborg units.
Fire Festivity, dealing damage to a target and {SplashDamage} damage to units adjacent to it.
Throw a grenade that deals damage in a 1 hex radius.
this is the name of a type of item that transforms a unit into another form
